example.title: Dating Message
example.program:
answer = input("Hello. Would you dine with me tonight? (Y or N): ")
if answer == 'Y': print("It is my soul that calls upon my name.") print("How silver-sweet sound lovers' tongues by night,") print("Like softest music to attending ears!") print("Thank you! See you outside OUClub at 7pm tonight.") if answer != 'Y': print("It is ok. Perhaps you are busy. Maybe next time")
